participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and energetic, enjoys socializing and helping others.
participant_1.background: I'm a professional wrestler. I volunteer in a homeless shelter. In my spare time, I do volunteer work. I like to work out a few times a week. I enjoy being around people.

participant_2.name: Tom
participant_2.personality: Struggling and introspective, often feeling lost and disconnected from others.
participant_2.background: I work at a nursing home. I am overweight and unhappy. My wife left me and took my children. I spend most of my time on Facebook when I am not working. I don't believe in God.
